subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Kanaan kept his outside shot at an IndyCar Series title alive, blistering the field to win the Meijer Indy 300 at Kentucky Speedway in Sparta, Ky. Kanaan passed A. J. Foyt IV with less than 10 laps to go for his second victory in a row.
snippet: Tony Kanaan kept his outside shot at an IndyCar Series title alive, blistering the field to win the Meijer Indy 300 at Kentucky Speedway in Sparta, Ky. Kanaan passed A. J. Foyt IV with less than 10 laps to go for his second victory in a row.
